scripts.docker:build:next: docker image rm -f daiwa-analytics-platform-next && docker build -t daiwa-analytics-platform-next dockerfiles/next
scripts.docker:build:httpd: docker image rm -f daiwa-analytics-platform-httpd && docker build -t daiwa-analytics-platform-httpd dockerfiles/httpd
scripts.docker:build:cypress: docker image rm -f daiwa-analytics-platform-cypress && docker build -t daiwa-analytics-platform-cypress dockerfiles/cypress
scripts.docker:build:local: cp env/.env.local .env.production && cp cypress/config/cypress.config.local.js cypress.config.js && npm run build
scripts.docker:build:vioo: cp env/.env.vioo .env.production && cp cypress/config/cypress.config.vioo.js cypress.config.js && npm run build
scripts.docker:build:dev: cp env/.env.dev .env.production && cp cypress/config/cypress.config.dev.js cypress.config.js && npm run build
scripts.docker:build:uat: cp env/.env.uat .env.production && cp cypress/config/cypress.config.uat.js cypress.config.js && npm run build
scripts.docker:build:prod: cp env/.env.prod .env.production && cp cypress/config/cypress.config.prod.js cypress.config.js && npm run build
scripts.git:merge:uat: git checkout uat && git merge development && git push && git checkout development
